CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive dual-purpose
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shell with a shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shell with a shaped charge thermobaric warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor and potentially igniting nearby objects.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Time-fuzed HE
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Explodes into a cone of shrapnel after some time of getting launched

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Laser Guided
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A HEAT Projectile that homes on its target after firing
